r\u00e9ponse d\u00e9clenchant l'affichag: response triggering the display of the message
Nombre maximum de tentatives quotidienne:
Maximum number of daily attempts by a player
Paid mode: unlimited attempts.
Free mode: maximum 24 attempts per day.
Validation automatique : Le joueur devra: Automatic validation: The player must enter an exact answer. It will be automatically checked based on the defined criteria (expected answer, case, variants).
Validation manuelle : Le joueur r\u00e9d: Manual validation: The player enters a free-form answer. You approve or reject their attempt manually from your personal area. An email and alert message notify you of each new submission.
